item.description:
Namaste.....

 

Let's gather together in the beginning of 2012 and celebrate!  

 

Let's practice Tantra together --- feel more connected to ourselves and to each other.   We'll learn a technique that allows you to attract what you want to you, open up to receiving deeply and feel profoundly connected to Source.  We'll breathe, chant, move, meditate and you'll leave feeling ALIVE AND IN LOVE!  (I love feeling that way, how about you?)  

 

I look forward to being with you.  

 

Tantra Gatherings are open to EVERYONE!  Singles, couples, and all gender preferences.  

 

We will begin promptly at 6 pm so please arrive on time.  The Gathering will end at 8 pm.

 

Warmly,

Pushana
item.name: New Year's Tantra Gathering
